item.title: John Boyega Assumed Finn Would Become a Jedi in ‘Star Wars’ Trilogy and Rey Would ‘Turn Against’ Him Like ‘Obi-Wan and Darth Vader’
item.description: John Boyega had a different expectation for his “Star Wars” arc than what made it on the big screen. During an appearance at Fan Expo Boston (via Screen Rant), Boyega, who played Stormtroo
